english.segment1: Nice girls are out there. With quick wit and long hair. I'm here but she's there. I look but she stares
english.segment3: Nice boys are in bands. They can sing but can't dance. I try to impress but. She laughs at my dress
english.segment5: This song will soon end and. Time's up to pretend. What will be my fate. If I can't land this date
